name: Sound Forge Audio Studio Project
summary: An SFAS file is an audio project created by MAGIX Sound Forge Audio Studio, a digital audio editing application for Windows. It contains project data, including timeline information, references to imported audio files, and edits applied to the tracks (e.g., distortion, reverb, EQ , delay, and fades), and project metadata . Users can open and edit SFAS project files with Sound Forge Audio Studio and convert them to widely supported audio formats.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
